name: wow
description: A highly customizable and professional pixel sorting effect that interacts dynamically with light, allowing for in and out sorting, directional changes, and size adjustments for superior visual quality.

threshold_min.description: Controls the minimum pixel brightness for sorting.

threshold_max.description: Controls the maximum pixel brightness for sorting.

sorting_direction.description: Sets the sorting direction: 0 for vertical, 1 for horizontal.

sorting_style.description: Sort based on: 0 = Hue, 1 = Saturation, 2 = Lightness.

sort_in.description: Enables pixel sorting from start to end.

sort_out.description: Enables pixel sorting from end to start.

sort_size.description: Defines the size of the sorting window.

intensity.description: Intensity multiplier for the pixel sorting effect.
